page.title: 06G. Smith-Kettlesing Gardener
page.content: Geoffrey Smith is a well-known local and national TV and radio per- sonality, featuring in such programmes as "Mr. Smith's World of Flowers" and "Gardener's Question Time," and the author of a string of best-selling gardening books. Although from Swaledale, he has lived in this area for almost 30 years, being for many years the head of the Northern Horticultural Soc- iety's Gardens at Harlow Carr, Harro- gate, before venturing into broad- casting. He thoroughly enjoys living in the area, caring passionately about the local environment, which he feels has remained generally unspoilt, though constant vigilence must be maintained in regard to agricultural building. All in all, he feels it to be a "cracking place to live."
